maqras.text: Wa 'Idha Waqa`a Al-Qawlu `Alayhim 'Akhrajna Lahum Dabbatan Mina Al-'Arđi Tukallimuhum 'Anna An-Nasa Kanu Bi'ayatina La Yuqinuna
Wa Yawma Nahshuru Min Kulli 'Ummatin Fawjaan Mimman Yukadhibu Bi'ayatina Fahum Yuza`una
Hatta 'Idha Ja'u Qala 'Akadhabtum Bi'ayati Wa Lam Tuhitu Biha `Ilmaan 'Ammadha Kuntum Ta`maluna
Wa Waqa`a Al-Qawlu `Alayhim Bima Zalamu Fahum La Yantiquna
Alam Yaraw 'Anna Ja`alna Al-Layla Liyaskunu Fihi Wa An-Nahara Mubsiraan 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Wa Yawma Yunfakhu Fi As-Suri Fafazi`a Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Man Fi Al-'Arđi 'Illa Man Sha'a Allahu Wa Kullun 'Atawhu Dakhirina
Wa Tara Al-Jibala Tahsabuha Jamidatan Wa Hiya Tamurru Marra As-Sahabi Sun`a Allahi Al-Ladhi 'Atqana Kulla Shay'in 'Innahu Khabirun Bima Taf`aluna
Man Ja'a Bil-Hasanati Falahu Khayrun Minha Wa Hum Min Faza`in Yawma'idhin 'Aminuna
Wa Man Ja'a Bis-Sayyi'ati Fakubbat Wujuhuhum Fi An-Nari Hal Tujzawna 'Illa Ma Kuntum Ta`maluna
Innama 'Umirtu 'An 'A`buda Rabba Hadhihi Al-Baldati Al-Ladhi Harramaha Wa Lahu Kullu Shay'in Wa 'Umirtu 'An 'Akuna Mina Al-Muslimina
Wa 'An 'Atluwa Al-Qur'ana Famani Ahtada Fa'innama Yahtadi Linafsihi Wa Man Đalla Faqul 'Innama 'Ana Mina Al-Mundhirina
Wa Quli Al-Hamdu Lillahi Sayurikum 'Ayatihi Fata`rifunaha Wa Ma Rabbuka Bighafilin `Amma Ta`maluna
Ta-Sin-Mim
Tilka 'Ayatu Al-Kitabi Al-Mubini
Natlu `Alayka Min Naba'i Musa Wa Fir`awna Bil-Haqqi Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Inna Fir`awna `Ala Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ja`ala 'Ahlaha Shiya`aan Yastađ`ifu Ta'ifatan Minhum Yudhabbihu 'Abna'ahum Wa Yastahyi Nisa'ahum 'Innahu Kana Mina Al-Mufsidina
Wa Nuridu 'An Namunna `Ala Al-Ladhina Astuđ`ifu Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Naj`alahum 'A'immatan Wa Naj`alahumu Al-Warithina
Wa Numakkina Lahum Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Nuriya Fir`awna Wa Hamana Wa Junudahuma Minhum Ma Kanu Yahdharuna
Wa 'Awhayna 'Ila 'Ummi Musa 'An 'Arđi`ihi Fa'idha Khifti `Alayhi Fa'alqihi Fi Al-Yammi Wa La Takhafi Wa La Tahzani 'Inna Radduhu 'Ilayki Wa Ja`iluhu Mina Al-Mursalina
Faltaqatahu 'Alu Fir`awna Liyakuna Lahum `Aduwaan Wa Hazanaan 'Inna Fir`awna Wa Hamana Wa Junudahuma Kanu Khati'ina
Wa Qalat Amra'atu Fir`awna Qurratu `Aynin Li Wa Laka La Taqtuluhu `Asa 'An Yanfa`ana 'Aw Nattakhidhahu Waladaan Wa Hum La Yash`uruna
Wa 'Asbaha Fu'uadu 'Ummi Musa Farighaan 'In Kadat Latubdi Bihi Lawla 'An Rabatna `Ala Qalbiha Litakuna Mina Al-Mu'uminina
Wa Qalat Li'khtihi Qussihi Fabasurat Bihi `An Junubin Wa Hum La Yash`uruna
